_sText:
1.General Information
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~	
	Title ............ ze_infested_prison_escape_v2
	Date ............. 5 Aug, 2010
	Version .......... 2th - Final relase
	Author ........... Malozemov Uri $$ur4ik$$
	E-mail ........... ur4ik456@mail.ru
	Other maps ....... zm_Island_of_Death_beta, zm_lost_hotel_v2, fy_2_bunkers_HDR, zm_horror_on_te_road_v1 and 2 and other
2.Play'n'Map Information
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~	
        Max players ...... 64
	Editor used ...... Source SDK sp3
	Build Time ....... 6 days
	Compile PC ....... Intel Core 2 Duo MHz / 3 gb (Windows XP Sp3)
	Compile time ..... 17 Min 21 Sec. 
        HDR.................. No
3.Map Installation
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
	Unzip all files into your steam\SteamApps\user_name\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps directory
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The second version includes:
 - 64 spawnpoints.
 - Optimized even more for better FPS. 
 - Fixed stumble on the gate at the beginning of map. 
 - Fixed fallen on stairs refrigerator (On final map).
 - Added a new passage in the ventilation.
 - Added env_sun.
 - Added more barricades.
 - Added more seats to the survival.

If you are interested in an old version of maps it can be download here :
http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/139829
